All the essays are released with license Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) The figures supporting the essays in this book respond to the practice of fair use (copyright act 17 USC 107 e art 70 of law n. 633/1941) being aimed at critical historical commentary and teaching

Research seminar held under the patronage of Docomomo Italia and SIRA - The Italian Society for Architectural Conservation/Restoration. Proceedings published with the contribution of the Department of Architecture and Arts (Università Iuav di Venezia).
For all of Le Corbusier's work: Fondation Le Corbusier / SIAE
MODERN HERITAGE BETWEEN CARE AND RISK
